articles.title: Advanced Micro Devices Could Score Major China Coup
articles.mainIdea: Advanced Micro Devices Could Score Major China Coup
articles.summary: 24/7 Wall St.: Advanced Micro Devices Could Score Major China Coup. For more than two years, U.S. export restrictions have severely limited Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ:AMD) and Nvidia (NASDAQ:NVDA) from selling their most advanced artificial intelligence (AI) accelerators in China. The controls, progressively tightened by the federal government, aim to prevent Beijing from obtaining cutting-edge technology that could advance military or strategic AI capabilities. As a ... Advanced Micro Devices Could Score Major China Coup Related tickers mentioned: AMD, BABAF, NVDA.
